title: RD proxy Savings
description: The response parameters of the RD proxy savings. Sub-schema

costs_percent_formatted.title: Costs Percent Formatted
costs_percent_formatted.description: Formatted value of the costs percent (e.g. '1%')

time_formatted.title: Time Formatted
time_formatted.description: Formatted value of the time (e.g. '13 seconds')

distance_formatted.title: Distance Formatted
distance_formatted.description: Formatted value of the distance (e.g. '0.1 mi')

distance_percent_formatted.title: Distance Percent Formatted
distance_percent_formatted.description: Formatted value of the distance percent (e.g. '9%')

time_percent_formatted.title: Time Percent Formatted
time_percent_formatted.description: Formatted value of the time percent (e.g. '6%')
